title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:
Introducing the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, a versatile and durable backpack designed to meet all your needs. Whether you're a teacher, a business professional, a picnic lover, or a frequent traveler, this backpack is perfect for you. It is also an excellent gift idea for occasions like Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year.

The MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack is compatible with laptops of various sizes, including 17.3, 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3 inches. It features an insulated cooler compartment that can hold up to 10 cans. With dimensions of 11.4 inches in length, 5.5 inches in width, and 6.9 inches in height, this compartment is perfect for keeping your food warm and drinks cold for 3-5 hours. It is made of water-resistant aluminum and high-quality lining material, ensuring optimal performance. Additionally, it is foldable for your convenience.

This backpack offers ample storage space with its main zipper pocket, suitable for clothes, files, papers, and more. It also features two small front pockets and two side pockets, perfect for carrying an umbrella or facial tissue. The internal organizers include slots and a key hook for added convenience.

For your charging needs, the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack comes with a USB port and a charging cable included. It is power bank required, ensuring that you can easily charge your devices on the go. The backpack is also TSA-approved and can unfold at an angle of 90-180 degrees, making it travel-friendly. It features a luggage strap for easy attachment to your suitcase.

Comfort is a priority with this backpack. It comes with padded shoulder straps, mesh back pads, and a padded handle, ensuring a comfortable carrying experience. The backpack also features an anti-theft pocket, suitable for passports, wallets, and ID cards, providing you with peace of mind.

The MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack is made of high-density polyester fabric, making it resistant to rips and scratches. It is also water-resistant, ensuring the safety of your belongings in case of rain.

Don't miss out on this versatile and durable backpack. Get the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack today and experience convenience and comfort like never before.

**Product Listing: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack**

The MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack is a versatile and durable backpack designed to meet all your needs. Whether you're a teacher, business professional, picnic enthusiast, or frequent traveler, this backpack is perfect for you. It also makes a great gift for special occasions like Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year.

**Product Details:**

- Laptop Compatibility: Compatible with 17.3, 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3 inch laptops.
- Insulated Cooler Compartment: Features dimensions of 11.4 x 5.5 x 6.9 inches and a capacity to hold up to 10 cans. It is made of water-resistant Aluminum and high-quality lining material, ensuring that your food stays warm and drinks stay cold for 3-5 hours. The compartment is also foldable for easy storage.
- Multiple Pockets: The backpack offers ample storage space with a roomy main zipper pocket suitable for clothes, files, papers, and more. It also includes 2 small front pockets and 2 side pockets for convenient storage of items like an umbrella or facial tissue. The internal organizers feature 1 slot and 1 key hook.
- Charging Feature: Equipped with a USB port and a charging cable, this backpack allows for easy charging of your devices on the go. A power bank is required for charging.
- Travel Friendly: TSA approved for hassle-free travel. The backpack can be unfolded at an angle of 90-180 degrees, making it convenient for security checks. It also includes a luggage strap for easy attachment to your suitcase.
- Comfortable Design: The backpack features padded shoulder straps, mesh back pads, and a padded handle for maximum comfort during extended use.
- Anti-Theft Features: Includes an anti-theft pocket for storing valuable items such as passports, wallets, and ID cards. The backpack also features a luggage strap for added security.
- Material: Made from high-density polyester fabric that is resistant to rips and scratches. The backpack is also water-resistant, ensuring that your belongings stay dry.
- Suitable For: Ideal for teachers, business professionals, picnic enthusiasts, and travelers.
- Gift Idea for Occasions: Perfect for Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year.
